original_text: So Babylon's young men will die in its streets. All its soldiers will die in battle on that day.’ That is what the Lord says. So Babylon's young men will die in its streets. All its soldiers will die in battle on that day.’ That is what the Lord says. So Babylon's young men will die in its streets. All its soldiers will die in battle on that day.’ That is what the Lord says. So Babylon's young men will die in its streets.
korean_text: 그러므로 그 날에 장정들이 그 거리에 엎드러지겠고 군사들이 멸절되리라 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: That is what the Lord says
